message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I think it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1200000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's worth to you.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget and the value I place on the product, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1100000. I hope this aligns better with what you're looking for.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further. After considering your proposal, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm offering the product to you for $1150000. This is a fair price considering the product's value to you, and I believe it's a reasonable compromise.

I appreciate your offer, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to counter with an offer of $1125000. I hope this proposal will be more favorable to you while still staying within my budget.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I appreciate your persistence in finding a mutually beneficial agreement. However, I'm still not willing to go below $1200000. I'm willing to make one more concession, and I'm offering the product to you for $1175000. This is my final offer, and I hope you'll consider it.

I appreciate your efforts, Alice. After reviewing your last offer, I would like to counter with an offer of $1162500. I hope this proposal will be more acceptable to you while still respecting my budget.
